snippet: Suzuki is strong in emerging markets, but has long had weak sales in the United States, where it will now stop selling its automobiles.
abstract: Suzuki announces that it will stop selling automobiles in the United States and put its American unit into Chapter 11 bankruptcy; company will focus on emerging markets, where it remains strong.
lead_paragraph: Suzuki is strong in emerging markets, but has long had weak sales in the United States, where it will now stop selling its automobiles.

headline.seo: Suzuki, Small-Car Maker, Gives Up on U.S. Market
headline.main: Suzuki’s Small Cars Were Wrong Fit in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Suzuki Exits U.S. Market For Autos
